import pandas as pd
import numpy as np

y_train = pd.read_csv('../input/used-car-price-dataset-competition-format/y_train.csv')

source.dfd813b4:
from sklearn.preprocessing import MinMaxScaler
scaler = MinMaxScaler()
scaler.fit(X_train_val)
X_scaled_train = scaler.transform(X_train_val)
X_scaled_test = scaler.transform(X_test_val)
source.2695a951:
from xgboost import XGBRegressor
model = XGBRegressor(n_estimators = 400, learning_rate = 0.1, max_depth=3, min_samples_leaf=4, min_samples_split=3)
model.fit(X_scaled_train, y_train_val)
pred_test = model.predict(X_scaled_test)
source.3a805cf3:
from sklearn.metrics import r2_score
r2_score(y_test_val, pred_test)
source.9845d138:
from sklearn.metrics import mean_squared_error
MSE = mean_squared_error(y_test_val, pred_test)
RMSE = np.sqrt(MSE)
print(RMSE)

X_test.brand = X_test.brand.astype('category').cat.codes

X_test.transmission = X_test.transmission.astype('category').cat.codes
X_test.fuelType = X_test.fuelType.astype('category').cat.codes

X_test.mileage = np.log1p(X_test.mileage)
